ygData.subject: Skeletons and our spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I am an 8th level gnomish enchanter.  Do our normal spells around this level work on skeletons?  The last few times I have engaged them, I have cast things
ygData.messageBody:
Hi,
I am an 8th level gnomish enchanter. Do our normal spells around this
level work on skeletons? The last few times I have engaged them, I have
cast things like Enfeeble and Mesmerize. The spells were not resisted, but
there was no indication of a spell effect, as is normally stated when these
spells take effect (e.g. 'Your target has been Mesmerized').

Does anyone know what this means? I think the spells may have worked, but I
am not positive. Can anyone shed any light? Thank you.

Xinorfarin, Cazic-Thule
